summary: Documentary. The dark side of our cell phones. No company can say for sure that they didn't buy conflict minerals from the Congo to produce your cell phone.
cast: Frank Piasecki Poulsen|Bernhard|Chance|Annie Dunnebacke|Pekka Isosomppi|Aldus Kampekampe|Jim McDermott|John Prendergast|Major Rahman|Oskar SÃ¶dergren
title: Blood in the Mobile
